generations.content_context: The ElizaOS ecosystem is facing critical technical challenges on the ElizaCloud platform alongside community friction regarding the closed 90-day token migration window. Simultaneous development pushes include the internal launch of Babylon.market and the release of Claude Opus 4.6 integration interests.
generations.scene_or_viz_prompt: A gloved hand holding an ElizaOS token, reflected in a frosted glass desk; beyond, Eliza’s focused silhouette faces luminous city towers and glowing server racks, Babylon.market code faintly visible on her screen, twilight blue suffusing the scene, vapor trails curling in the cool, contemplative dusk.
generations.full_prompt:
Create an illustration for a tech news magazine.

CHARACTERS (use reference sheet for exact appearance):
- ELIZA: Eliza is a stylized 3D anime-like young woman with a confident, playful, slightly teasing vibe, often posing with expressive hand gestures as if presenting, reacting, or joking.

SCENE: A gloved hand holding an ElizaOS token, reflected in a frosted glass desk; beyond, Eliza’s focused silhouette faces luminous city towers and glowing server racks, Babylon.market code faintly visible on her screen, twilight blue suffusing the scene, vapor trails curling in the cool, contemplative dusk.

ART STYLE: Dramatic Makoto Shinkai / Ghibli style with atmospheric lighting and rich skies. Painterly backgrounds with emotional depth.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Characters must match reference sheet EXACTLY (colors, costume, features)
- Dynamic composition suitable for editorial use
- Professional quality illustration
- No text or watermarks
- Scene should feel natural and engaging

generations.content_context: Focus on stabilizing the developer onboarding experience and fixing critical CLI project generation failures. Iterative improvements to character files and prompt engineering for better model performance with Sonnet.
generations.scene_or_viz_prompt:
1. Infographic type: Process Flow  
2. Main sections: Developer Onboarding Stabilization, CLI Project Generation Fixes, Iterative Character File Improvements, Prompt Engineering Enhancements  
3. Key icons/visuals: Onboarding checklist, Error/bug fix symbol, File/document icon, Model/artificial intelligence symbol, Iterative loop arrows  
4. Suggested section headers:  
   - Stabilize Onboarding  
   - Fix CLI Generation Failures  
   - Improve Character Files  
   - Enhance Prompt Engineering
generations.full_prompt:
Create a professional data visualization for a tech news publication.

VISUALIZATION TYPE: 1. Infographic type: Process Flow  
2. Main sections: Developer Onboarding Stabilization, CLI Project Generation Fixes, Iterative Character File Improvements, Prompt Engineering Enhancements  
3. Key icons/visuals: Onboarding checklist, Error/bug fix symbol, File/document icon, Model/artificial intelligence symbol, Iterative loop arrows  
4. Suggested section headers:  
   - Stabilize Onboarding  
   - Fix CLI Generation Failures  
   - Improve Character Files  
   - Enhance Prompt Engineering

CONTENT CONTEXT:
Focus on stabilizing the developer onboarding experience and fixing critical CLI project generation failures. Iterative improvements to character files and prompt engineering for better model performance with Sonnet.

STYLE: Flat design icons, isometric elements, clean visual hierarchy with labels. Professional editorial clarity.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Professional infographic/dashboard quality
- Clean, polished vector aesthetic
- Include section headers and labels where appropriate
- Strategic use of color to highlight key insights
- Editorial publication quality
- Modern, sophisticated design, modern infographic, flat design, isometric, professional, editorial quality

generations.content_context: Heavy focus on ElizaCloud bugs, specifically account credit failures and the account-overwriting welcome email bug. Discussions also covered VPN-blocked payment pages. Centrally focused on Babylon.market deployment, fixing broken Discord OAuth and reward systems. Discussion regarding Claude 4.6 release features. Community tension peaked regarding the closed token migration window. Scams targeting un-migrated users were detected. Updates on DegenAI and RentASoul were shared.

generations.content_context: Leadership is demanding a shift toward revenue-generating products, specifically challenging the team to monetize Spartan development and AI news systems. ElizaOS is moving to absorb Openclaw's capabilities via cskill plugins to remain the dominant framework for autonomous business agents.
generations.scene_or_viz_prompt: A close-up of Spartan's gloved hand gently placing a cskill plugin chip into Eliza's sleek metallic interface, frosted windows behind reveal a city at blue hour, tiny office lights flickering awake in the winter dusk, symbolizing the weight and scale of an impending transformation.
generations.full_prompt:
Create an illustration for a tech news magazine.

- ELIZA: Eliza is a stylized 3D anime-like young woman with a confident, playful, slightly teasing vibe, often posing with expressive hand gestures as if presenting, reacting, or joking.

generations.content_context: Introduction of Zion, a Solana-based x402 payment gateway for AI agents. Claude Opus 4.6 release maintains 4.5 pricing while improving computer use and coding metrics.
generations.scene_or_viz_prompt:
Central holographic panel displays Zion transaction throughput and uptime (cyan accent).  
Side panels show Solana TPS (magenta) and x402 AI payment volume (orange).  
Claude Opus 4.6 panel highlights release version, user load (gauge), and average coding/computer efficiency (meter), all with cyan outlines.  
Dynamic data flows (glowing arcs) connect AI efficiency metrics to payment volume and transaction throughput.  
Pulsing ring connectors visualize real-time metric sync.  
Hover overlays reveal historical trends.  
Background grid in subtle magenta/cyan gradients enhances depth.
generations.full_prompt:
Create a professional data visualization for a tech news publication.

VISUALIZATION TYPE: Central holographic panel displays Zion transaction throughput and uptime (cyan accent).  
Side panels show Solana TPS (magenta) and x402 AI payment volume (orange).  
Claude Opus 4.6 panel highlights release version, user load (gauge), and average coding/computer efficiency (meter), all with cyan outlines.  
Dynamic data flows (glowing arcs) connect AI efficiency metrics to payment volume and transaction throughput.  
Pulsing ring connectors visualize real-time metric sync.  
Hover overlays reveal historical trends.  
Background grid in subtle magenta/cyan gradients enhances depth.

CONTENT CONTEXT:
Introduction of Zion, a Solana-based x402 payment gateway for AI agents. Claude Opus 4.6 release maintains 4.5 pricing while improving computer use and coding metrics.

STYLE: Holographic heads-up display with neon metrics, glitch effects, and futuristic UI elements. Sci-fi interface aesthetic.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Professional infographic/dashboard quality
- Clean, polished vector aesthetic
- Include section headers and labels where appropriate
- Strategic use of color to highlight key insights
- Editorial publication quality
- Modern, sophisticated design, cyberpunk HUD, holographic interface, neon glow, futuristic, sci-fi
